duties_responsibilities.duty: Draft preliminary and final site plans utilizing AutoCAD Civil 3D.
Review project survey data to analyze existing site conditions and factors to consider for development.

Prepare reports, opinions, and recommendations for the direction of the project, including but not limited to hydrology/hydraulic studies, due diligence/site analysis reports, engineer’s opinion of probable costs, project schedules, utility computations, and more.
Provide construction-related services such as permit applications, cut sheets, quantity estimates, and transmittals.
Utilize AutoCAD Civil 3D and related engineering software packages to complete assignments on time and within prescribed standards.
Demonstrate strong written and verbal communication skills when interacting with current staff members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering. EIT or FE highly desired. 1+ year of experience with commercial or residential land development.
